titleproper.value: Guide to the <emph render="italic">New York Review</emph> Archive <lb/><date calendar="gregorian" era="ce">1957-1958 </date><lb/><num>MSS 19 </num> <num>MSS.019</num>

author.value: Collection processed by Processed by: Amber Creger, 1999.

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2017-06-14T15:52:00</date>

abstract.value: The <emph render="italic">New York Review</emph> Archive is a small collection of correspondence to the <emph render="italic">New York Review</emph>'s editor, Peter McCurtin. McCurtin edited the <emph render="italic">New York Review</emph> with William Atkins in 1958.

p.value: Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

Published citations should take the following form:<lb/><lb/>Identification of item, date (if known); The New York Review Archive; MSS 019; box number; folder number; <address><addressline>Fales Library and Special Collections</addressline></address> , New York University Libraries.
Series I: Correspondence: includes a copy of the <emph render="italic">New York Review</emph> (box 1, folder 1).

subject.value: Small presses -- New York (State) -- New York
